title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.32 - Use of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.32 - Use of permits

State Regulations
(a) Noncommercial permits when granted and
issued, or renewed, shall be for the use of permittees, their families and
guests for access to the shoreline; any commercial use or transfer thereof is
prohibited. (b) Commercial permits
when granted and issued, or renewed, shall be for the use of the permittees
only; any transfer thereof is prohibited. (c) The use of motorized vehicles is
prohibited except for access to the shoreline. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
